content: The new mobile app doesn’t seem to have a search feature. Is this coming soon?

Yep! We expect it to ship next week. It won’t be more powerful than the legacy apps’ search, yet, but we’ve heard lots of feedback from users missing search and we want to restore what was useful asap. :)
Oh -- I was BAFFLED a moment ago trying to find the search and somehow found this thread
You'll find a search feature in today's release v30.0.260; details here: https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/channel/1-announce/topic/mobile.20releases/near/2213050
